p: T. chebula is considered as digestive and gives strength to tissues, particularly the sense organs. It purifies blood and has laxative and antipyretic actions. It is prescribed for dyspepsia, piles, hepatosplenomegaly, irritable bowel syndrome, and cardiac dysfunction.
